summary: A Better Shadowmere - it\'s fun trying to kill it
descriptionHtml: Shadowmere is meant to be the best stead in skyrim. I disagree - true shadowmere is stronger then most stead. However, you jump off a small cliff or hill and shadowmere dies like any horse. Ultimate Shadowmere aims to make shadowmere the true ultimate stead it should be - stronger, faster and harder to kill. The fun bit is trying to kill shadowmere.
author: Xycoet
